name: 高得畬
objective:
*Memories

    -Memory devices: Latch & FF
    -RAM & ROM
    -DFT, MEM BIST
    -State assignment
*Packaging
*ALU design
    -Adders
    -Multiplier
*Backend Design
    -APR
    -Special Net
    -Misc.
*Architecture
*Examples
schedule:
wk  date        Notes
01. 09/14/17 Chapter 5 (Memory types, Set-up & hold time)
02. 09/21/17 Chapter 5 (Memory devices: Latch, FF, & ROM)

04. 10/05/17 Chapter 5 (Memory timing and clock, Testing)
05. 10/12/17 Chapter 5 (Sequential machine, State graph)
06. 10/19/17 (QZ1) Packaging (test and flow)
07. 10/26/17 Packaging (Production issues)
08. 11/02/17 Midterm Examination 
09. 11/09/17 Exam review, Chapter 6 (ALU, adder)
10. 11/16/17 Chapter 6 (Multiplier) 
11. 11/23/17 Chapter 7 (placement)
12. 11/30/17 Chapter 7 (Routing, Special nets)
13. 12/07/17 Chapter 7 (Misc before TO) 
14. 12/14/17 Chapter 8 (Architecture)
15. 12/21/17 (QZ2) Chapter 8 (Architecture)
16. 12/28/18 Chapter 9  (Example)
17. 01/04/18 Final Examination
18. 01/11/18 Exam review, What’s Next?
scorePolicy:

Midterm 35%
Final 35%
